name: Visitor Center
description: A visitor center is a building housing information for visitors, typically including some or all of the following: information resources, facilities (e.g. restrooms, drinking water), ranger staff, and exhibits.
howToMap: Add a visitor center by creating a point on top of the associated building and selecting "Visitor Center" from the "Select feature type" menu. Additionally, trace the building footprint if it has not been added already.
